Module FoundationsF25
Package guiRole1

Class ControllerRole1Home

java.lang.Object
guiRole1.ControllerRole1Home
public class ControllerRole1Home extends Object
Controller class for Role1 home screen functionality. Handles user interactions, post management, and navigation for Role1 users.

  • Constructor Details

    • ControllerRole1Home

      public ControllerRole1Home()
      Default constructor for ControllerRole1Home.

  • Method Details

    • loadPosts

      public static void loadPosts(String filter, String thread)

      Method: loadPosts(String filter, String thread)

      Description: Loads posts from the database based on the specified filters. Updates the UI list with the retrieved posts.

      Parameters:
      filter - filter type ("My posts", "All posts", "Read", "Unread")
      thread - the thread type to filter by ("All Threads" shows all threads)

    • loadPosts

      public static void loadPosts(boolean mineOnly, String thread)
      Overloaded method for backward compatibility.
      Parameters:
      mineOnly - true to show only current user's posts, false to show all posts
      thread - the thread type to filter by

    • readPost

      public static void readPost()

      Method: readPost()

      Description: Opens the post reader dialog for the currently selected post. Retrieves the selected post from the list view and opens it in read-only mode.

    • setupFilterListener

      public static void setupFilterListener()

      Method: setupFilterListener()

      Description: Sets up the event listener for the filter dropdown selection. Refreshes the posts list when switching between "All posts" and "My posts".

    • setupThreadListener

      public static void setupThreadListener()

      Method: setupThreadListener()

      Description: Sets up the event listener for the thread dropdown selection. When a thread is selected, the posts list is refreshed to show only posts from that thread type.

    • setupDoubleClickHandler

      public static void setupDoubleClickHandler()

      Method: setupDoubleClickHandler()

      Description: Sets up the double-click handler for the posts list. Allows users to quickly open a post by double-clicking on it.

    • openReader

      public static void openReader(Map<String,Object> postRow)

      Method: openReader

      Description: Opens a modal dialog for reading a post and its replies. Displays the post content and provides CRUD operations for replies.

      Parameters:
      postRow - the post row to display and read
